mapper.insert: insert into entering (b_num, store_addr, b_name, b_phone, b_enter_copy, b_enter_copy2 , store_name, store_addr_more,post, enter_status, id ) values (#{b_num}, #{store_addr},#{b_name}, #{b_phone} , #{b_enter_copy}, #{b_enter_copy2}, #{store_name}, #{store_addr_more}, #{post}, '1', #{id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from B_NUM_CHK where b_num = #{b_num}
